project01.title: America Exposure
project01.description: This project allows users to search for scenic outdoor landscape photography spots in the U.S. via a "choose your own adventure" experience. The user can save the locations to either a bucket list or an upcoming trip.

project02.title: Movie Maker
project02.description: This project depicts a movie maker that shows whether the film you are trying to make is on budget via a budget tracker and status bar based on the actors, special effects, animals and locations chosen.

project03.title: Band Website
project03.description: This project depicts a failed band website with separate pages for information about the band members, tour dates, songs and merch available for purchase using simple JS, HTML5 and CSS.
